# text-table

generate borderless text table strings suitable for printing to stdout

[![build status](https://secure.travis-ci.org/substack/text-table.png)](http://travis-ci.org/substack/text-table)

[![browser support](https://ci.testling.com/substack/text-table.png)](http://ci.testling.com/substack/text-table)

# example

## default align

``` js
var table = require('text-table');
var t = table([
    [ 'master', '0123456789abcdef' ],
    [ 'staging', 'fedcba9876543210' ]
]);
console.log(t);
```

```
master   0123456789abcdef
staging  fedcba9876543210
```

## left-right align

``` js
var table = require('text-table');
var t = table([
    [ 'beep', '1024' ],
    [ 'boop', '33450' ],
    [ 'foo', '1006' ],
    [ 'bar', '45' ]
], { align: [ 'l', 'r' ] });
console.log(t);
```

```
beep   1024
boop  33450
foo    1006
bar      45
```

## dotted align

``` js
var table = require('text-table');
var t = table([
    [ 'beep', '1024' ],
    [ 'boop', '334.212' ],
    [ 'foo', '1006' ],
    [ 'bar', '45.6' ],
    [ 'baz', '123.' ]
], { align: [ 'l', '.' ] });
console.log(t);
```

```
beep  1024
boop   334.212
foo   1006
bar     45.6
baz    123.
```

## centered

``` js
var table = require('text-table');
var t = table([
    [ 'beep', '1024', 'xyz' ],
    [ 'boop', '3388450', 'tuv' ],
    [ 'foo', '10106', 'qrstuv' ],
    [ 'bar', '45', 'lmno' ]
], { align: [ 'l', 'c', 'l' ] });
console.log(t);
```

```
beep    1024   xyz
boop  3388450  tuv
foo    10106   qrstuv
bar      45    lmno
```
